attributes.action: STOP THE BAN ON THE XL AMERICAN BULLY AND GET RID OF RISHI SUNAK!
attributes.additional_details:
When brought up correctly with the correct training in place the XL American Bully is an extremely loving and loyal breed, they are nothing like they are portrayed in the media!
BAN THE BAD OWNERS NOT THE BREED.

Rishi Sunak doesn’t even know the genetic makeup of the XL American Bully so therefor should NOT be able to decide as to whether the breed is banned or not.
attributes.background: We want to STOP the ban on the XL American Bully, we want to crack down on backyard breeders and bad owners and stop blaming the breed! We want rid of Rishi Sunak because he’s completely uneducated when it comes to the bully breed!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
